extendedInfo.description: *Must Have! the best App Protector on Market!*App Protector can lock any application on your phone: SMS, Message, Gmail, Photo, Gallery, Market..any app u choose. You can choose to only lock sensitive apps, while leaving other apps unlocked. Never worry about a friend grabbing your phone again!App Protector can lock your private messages and pictures without locking the whole phone. Better than vault apps! Not a Simple Keyguard! The best App Lock on Market! FEATURES:# Lock with either password or pattern# Automatic Locking Mode and Manual Locking Mode# Locale Plugin and Tasker Plugin included# Widget for quick locking/unlocking# Built-in Password Recovery# Powerful and Customized# Cannot be killed by task killersTry free version? Search for App Protector LiteIf uninstallation fails,1. Go to setting->security->device admin and uncheck App Protector2. Remove this app normallyContact DEV on our website or forum for customer support.Enterprise version and other MDM solutions available. Enterprise features includes web filtering and customized launchers for only company approved apps.  Contact sales on clutchmobile.com.keyword: protector, app protector, app lock, applock, app locking, app protection, application lock, application locking, mobile security, application locking, web filtering, app password

reviews.title: Update decreases usefulness
reviews.comment: 8/31 update does not allow me to lock all apps. Only gives me the option to lock a select few.  9/2 update does not correct this issue. No response from the developers.
reviews.author: John P. Land

reviews.title: The new update kinda sucks
reviews.comment: The new lock screen us downright ugly without any option to change it back to the old one. Also, it\'s been pretty buggy. Might have to find an alternative...
reviews.author: Richie Turner

reviews.title: Improved
reviews.comment: Well, now we have the options menu back, after three updates, so we should be grateful for that. Functionality is returning slowly. Still seems unsteady - locked apps are allowed to execute before being hidden, which is behavior the old version didn\'t do, which means that the app\'s screen and any content on it is visible briefly, longer if the phone has a lot of apps open.
reviews.author: Greg Lawton

reviews.title: OK
reviews.comment: This last update keep asking to unlock when reading mail or on Google play apps that I have locked. Please fix keep asking to unlock even though it was already unlock. On JB 4.3
reviews.author: David Lim

reviews.title: Great but..
reviews.comment: Wish you could protect subcategories in your picture gallery rather than lock it all  and why would this app need to modify or DELETE anything??
reviews.author: Aaron Boemker

reviews.title: Best application locking program
reviews.comment: Thank you very much for fixing this app. I\'ve used it for years and it has kept my private data from prying eyes. I don\'t have to lock my phone to keep my info secure, I can just lock the apps instead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Bring back the old user interface.
reviews.author: James Soung

reviews.title: ***RECENT UPDATE***
reviews.comment: Thanx 4 the option of makin\' the unlock pattern INvisible again..much better! :)
reviews.author: Quiet Storm

reviews.title: NO LONGER WORKS AFTER THE RECENT UPDATE
reviews.comment: After the last update, app misbehaves. Tried uninstall and reinstall but the problem persists. Password can be changed from the app but when you try to enter the PW on the widget, it will still ask for the default password. Will change the rating once problem is resolved.  UPDATED: Problem resolved on 08/30 update
reviews.author: Mark Jayson Gutierrez

reviews.comment: Very useful app
reviews.author: Leonid Gurevich

reviews.title: Dont work
reviews.comment: It wont lock anything for me iput my keep safein it and otherthings but you can still open app? And wtf do you put email recovery. O and delete and dont matter if u put password in reinstall and boom put new password in look at everything scamm...... 1.99 bull
reviews.author: Keylon Jolley

reviews.title: Missing Invisible pattern for Unlock
reviews.comment: With the new 8/29/13 update, there is no longer an option to have make the unlock pattern invisible.  Please add this back!  I do not want people to see my pattern when I unlock my phone.  Otherwise, great App!
reviews.author: Andy Nguyen

reviews.title: Gr8 privacy app!
reviews.comment: This app works just as described... Does the job very well at keeping private info private!
reviews.author: Nixon Ciceron

reviews.title: 4 years
reviews.comment: And still the best locking app ive come across well worth the price
reviews.author: Terrance Thompson

reviews.title: 100% Indispensable
reviews.comment: Nice easy Privacy. Worth the money. Lock apps that you don\'t want someone to open if you let them play with your phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab
reviews.comment: Works great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Do not buy!!! Force closes and dose not open apps!! Emails sent and no replies! I REGRET PAYING FOR THIS JUNK!!! DROID
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Auto update when it needed to view my contacts.
reviews.author: Antoine Ziegler

reviews.title: App
reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Irene Horton

reviews.comment: Does what its suppose to do.
reviews.author: J MK
